gov.nasa.jpf.tool

Class RunTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.jpf.tool.Run
      • gov.nasa.jpf.tool.RunTest

  • public class RunTest
extends Run
    tool to run JPF test with configured classpath arguments are supposed to be of type {} {} all leading config options are used to create the initial Config, but be aware of that each test (TestJPF.verifyX() invocation) uses its own Config and JPF object, i.e. can have different path settings This automatically adds .test_classpath to the startup classpath
